item.title: Turning Java into a Web Application
item.description: So todayâ€™s blog focusses on putting one of my recently built Java games online. I am currently in the process of building an online portfolio to present a few things I have worked on so far in my course but also to showcase tasks I have worked on in my spare time. During a 2 hour window last week I decided to push my Java skills to build a very basic Tic Tac Toe (Noughts and Crosses) game.

item.title: First Post
item.description: So this is the first post on my new Data portfolio. Phew what a journey! This blog has spent over eight months on my to do list. But now it is alive! So let’s try and recap everything so far. Why am I here? How did I get here? And where to from here? Well I am Elleni. I am, and for the past 10 years have been a photographer. I run my own business/businesses here:
